title: Brand New house for sale in Malabe
details:
This beautiful house is located in a very good neighborhood with quick access roads to Malabe town ,Arangala and highway.

Details:

10 perch of land
2100 sqft house
3 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms
maids washroom
Walking distance to a bus route

It's a centralized location to Kaduwela road, Arangala and quick access to highway.

Living, Dining and pantry
Nice garden space in front

3-4 car parking space within the premises

House will be fully completed within next few days and do not miss this fantastic opportunity !
Contact us for more details and viewings can be arranged only on prior appointments
